data.title: MIM Software Inc.
data.meta_description: Provider of innovative solutions for Radiation Oncology, Nuclear Medicine, Radiology, Interventional Radiology, and Molecular, Neuro, and Cardiac Imaging.
data.text:
Contour ProtégéAI™

Expect More from Auto-Contouring

Contouring continues to be a time-consuming process – by utilizing next-generation deep learning algorithms, clinicians can standardize and expedite the pre-planning workflow.

Achieve More Efficient Contouring

Remote Access Solutions

We offer a number of remote access solutions to ensure a seamless transition to a remote working environment without reducing efficiency or quality.

Learn More

Case Studies

MIM Software's products are used globally by leading institutions. Discover how some of our customers are using MIM to improve clinical workflows and enhance patient care.

Explore Case Studies

Upcoming Events

We have many exciting upcoming events planned, including conferences we'll be exhibiting at and educational webinars we'll be hosting to ensure you're getting the most out of our products.

View Upcoming Events
